Message.BodyString: Greetings Manager. Planet ID 6462 continues to show little improvement with latest protocols. Very low life signs, resources are failing to develop. I will notify you if things change but currently I am less than optimistic. -Planetary Supervisor Dan Garn Planet 6462 ext. 1245
Heyyy everyone, it's Becky from HR! We've got a long weekend coming up so be sure you submit your timecards before Yrgalday! Thaaanks!

Hey buddy, Just wanted to follow up with our talk earlier today, I'm really hoping you can turn your planet around. Would really hate to let you go but I can't be carrying around deadweight, maybe Les can give you some pointers. Don't be afraid to ask for help from your betters! Keep that in mind! -Jay "The burg" Byrzburg x.3456

Couldn't help but notice you forgot to leave a rent check out for me. We're going to have to have a house meeting, don't flake like last time or I'm pouring your "special occasion" wine down the drain. -Paul

Hey Les! Things are going great down here! The dinosaurs are thriving and life is flourishing across the planet. Not sure what magic you're working up there but it's showing great dividends. I have noticed a slight uptick in meteoric activity but the defense matrix is holding strong. Keep it up man! -Supervisor Flark Planet ZZ9-42 ext. 52752

Hey honey, I know you've been working real hard lately, so I thought maybe we'd go out somewhere special tonight? I guess that's not so much a question because I already booked us the Gray Room at Blorfo's! See you there at 47 o'clock sharp! -Pookums
Heyyy everyone, it's Becky from HR! We've got a long weekend coming up so be sure you submit your timecards before Yrgalday! Thaaanks!

Greetings Manager. A moderate uptick in activity today, not totally sure what from. Possibly just an issue with our instrumentation. I'll keep an eye on it and report in if there's actually a positive trend. -Planetary Supervisor Dan Garn Planet 6462 ext. 1245

Attention all Planetary Managers! The Planetary Manager Convention is coming up in just a few short weeks. This is a great opportunity to learn about all the latest happenings in PM Business Solutions! If you'd like to speak at this please contact a PMCON with your submission package! Be sure to submit your registration before 4256/45 for early bird rates! See you there!

Attention all Planetary Managers! The Planetary Manager Convention is coming up in just a few short weeks. This is a great opportunity to learn about all the latest happenings in PM Business Solutions! If you'd like to speak at this please contact a PMCON with your submission package! Be sure to submit your registration before 4256/45 for early bird rates! See you there!

Heyyy Les, Soooo, bad news bud, seems like the Meteoric Defense Matrix got disabled and the planet got hit pretty bad. The dust kicked up from the impact has covered the planet in a layer of dust that basically killed everything. Life scores way down, resources took a hit, the environment is mostly fine and should return to normal as long as temperatures hold steady above 13frz. -Supervisor Flark - Planet ZZ9-42 ext. 52752

Hey rockstar, heard about your bad luck with the asteroid, or was it a meteor? I can never keep those two straight. I AM worried that this sort of event can sometimes kick start a civilization, make sure your verticals are still out of alignment and we shouldn't have any problem. Anyways just wanted to say that everybody has an off day and I'm sure this won't reflect too poorly on your semi-quarterly review. -Jay "The burg" Byrzburg x.3456
Greetings Les-Master05 Brunk Korix (recruiter) wants to colab on the #1 business network CoLabOrate. Login to your account to accept their invitation to colab. DO NOT REPLY

Greetings Manager. Nothing really exciting, numbers are similar to yesterday. I guess you could say the planet is flat... sorry I'm not great at jokes but it's really boring down here. -Planetary Supervisor Dan Garn Planet 6462 ext. 1245

Hey Jon! It's Trisha, I'm the PM of Planet 2209 (doin alright thank you very much). I heard about how your planet is doing so well. Was wondering if I could include a piece about it for our weekly newsletter. That ok? Hit me up! -Trisha PM Planet 2209 ext. 7374
Hey buddy, Seen you've been slowly rising in the rankings. Call me a zark's ass for doubting you! We should go get a drink sometime after work, keep up the good work. -Jay "The burg" Byrzburg x.3456

Hey everyone Becky again! We're planning a special surprise for everyone and need your hat sizes. Please respond with your head circumfrence and the thickness of your antennae (we use the Q-QQL scale, no judgment). Thaaanks.

Hey everyone Becky again! We're planning a special surprise for everyone and need your hat sizes. Please respond with your head circumfrence and the thickness of your antennae (we use the Q-QQL scale, no judgment). Thaaanks.

Hey boss, Things are getting worse, much worse. So the temperature dropped suddenly and there was a brief ice age. The ice age cleared but here's the real bad news... I hope you're sitting down for this, the planet has got apes now. We're going to need to stabilize this before they start understanding tools, they're not ready for it. Be sure to cancel any and all seeding protocols. -Supervisor Flark - Planet ZZ9-42 ext. 52752

You let your planet become infested with apes!? I don't need to remind you what happens if you don't deal with this soon. If they reach synergization we're going to be having a very difficult discussion. -Jay
Les-bear, is everything alright? You seemed really out of it yesterday and you rushed out this morning. Let me know if there's anything I can do. -Marsha

Greetings Manager. Resource numbers are up, lifesigns continue to be stable. Saw we're starting to rise in the rankings, I'm sure that's making you happy. I know I hated how we were on the bottom for so long. At this rate we could easily be on top before the end of the cycle. -Planetary Supervisor Dan Garn Planet 6462 ext. 1245

Hey everyone, I wanted to highlight Jon Stirch the Manager of Planet 6462. Over the past few days he's turned a lifeless little rock into a thriving resource cache. Take from Jon's example and remember to never give up hope! -Jay "The burg" Byrzburg x.3456

Hey everyone, I wanted to highlight Jon Stirch the Manager of Planet 6462. Over the past few days he's turned a lifeless little rock into a thriving resource cache. Take from Jon's example and remember to never give up hope! -Jay "The burg" Byrzburg x.3456
Greeting loyal ArzMart customer! This weekend there's a special 40% discount on all interoceters and interoceter-related goods. Remember when you think of interoceters think ArzMart!

CRITICAL REPORT The apes have gone humanoid, I repeat the apes have gone humanoid. They're using tools and walking upright, they're hunting AND gathering. This is a Class A civilization jump forward. I'm going to have to report this. I've assigned a civilization specialist in the interim. -Supervisor Flark Planet ZZ9-42 ext. 52752
Meet me in my office as soon as you get this message. If you can't slow the humanoids shelter construction I'll have to write you up. -Supervisor Flark Planet ZZ9-42 ext. 52752

Greetings Mr. Izfizz, I'm Jane Parzkek the specially assigned Civilization Specialist. I was assigned by your Planetary Supervisor to provide support. Seems like you've really made a mess of this haven't you Mr. Izfizz? Well I'm going to initiate an immediate freeze off.This should kill the humanoids and reduce the resource score, but we can't afford to take any chances. Temperature must maintain below 10frz to ensure total burnoff. -Jane Parzkek - CivSpec Class 2 x.4652

Greetings Izfizz01, We saw that you recently stopped contributing to your retirement funds. Is this correct? If you would like to resume contributions at your previous rate please reach out to your represenative. Thanks. RetirementX automated message system

Hey there, you've been doing great! Hope you're enjoying the praise you've been getting. We're about to kick this thing into high gear. Civilization is getting out of control on this planet, you're going to need to slow it down so we don't raise any suspicions. Try reallocating some resources. Keep it up!

Greetings Manager. Resource numbers rose sharply, dipped, and then rose again. Life signs are starting to show stronger than before, we could be looking at algae very shortly. Fingers Crossed -Planetary Supervisor Dan Garn Planet 6462 ext. 1245

Hopefully this gets through the internal encryption. I know your planet is on the outs and you probably hate that smug Les, I may have a solution. I can improve things for your planet but only if you take Les down a peg. Looking at security tapes he gets up for coffee every so often for only 90 seconds, you can set your watch to it. Get to his terminal and mess up his planet, don't clock out until things are done. Don't get caught, I'll contact you again soon.

Greetings Mr. Stirch, I'm a Civilization Specialist Analyst currently assigned to Mr. Izzfizz's planet and I had some questions about some strange incidents happening on his world. If you have some time if you could please call me? Greatly appreciated. -Jane Parzkek CivSpec Class 2 x.4652

Greetings Mr. Izzfizz, Unfortunately it appears that you unwisely triggered a Massive Structure Generation protocol. This has caused the humanoids to create large pyramid structures. I hope you understand the severity of this situation. I have started to look into your suspicions that this is some sort of conspiracy, will report on my findings. -Jane Parzkek - CivSpec Class 2 x.4652

Honey, I overheard you mumbling in your sleep about "someone out to get you" and then you just kept repeating "More Scalability." Is everything alright? You've been seeming very paranoid lately, maybe we should discuss with Dr. Qirbyrz next week? -Marsha

Massive Structures? Really? Now they've got pyramids, I hope you're happy! Why don't you just give these apes the formula for rocket fuel so they can come up here and take our jobs and save us a whole lot of time!? I'm sorry, this is just really stressing me out, you know my job is on the line too? -Supervisor Flark - Planet ZZ9-42 ext. 52752

Oh thank goodness, there was a string of volcanic eruptions. Most of the seats of knowledge were destroyed and the humanoids have entered a dark age. They're starting wars over symbols! We might actually be ok. As long as these smaller civilizations stay far away from each other they should continue at a manageable level without presenting a threat. -Supervisor Flark - Planet ZZ9-42 ext. 52752

Greetings Mr. Izzfizz, I heard about your dark age, congratulations, hopefully this is a turning point for your planet and in the future we can Leverage its Assets. I've continued my investigation into your suspicions of sabotage and currently turned up with no evidence. I will continue to monitor the situation but in light of recent events I don't believe that is necessary. Thank you for your time. -Jane Parzkek - CivSpec Class 2 x.4652
Great work keeping it together there buddy! Leave those apes in the dark! Keep up the good work! -The Burg

Hello Mr. IzzFizz! I have a special offer for you from the Zargon Hotel. We can offer you a special rate if you stay with us this upcoming weekend. For this special rate please enter the following code in our site: M154L1GNV3RT1C4L$ Hope to see you this weekend! -Zargon Promotionals
They're starting to catch on, maybe you should consider a vacation? consider. a. vacation.

Greetings Manager. Numbers continue to climb but are stable enough to not raise any concerns. Looks like we're going to have a nice relaxing weekend. -Planetary Supervisor Dan Garn Planet 6462 ext. 1245
Hey bud, thanks for the rent check. We're thinking about putting in a Pizza order tonight, you in?

As you may already know our colleague, Tanya Qwatlu, has caught a really awful case of the radiation madness. I'll be swinging by with a get well card it would mean a lot if everyone could sign it! Thanks! -Becky

As you may already know our colleague, Tanya Qwatlu, has caught a really awful case of the radiation madness, (she's running a fever of at least 28frz). I'll be swinging by with a get well card it would mean a lot if everyone could sign it! Thanks! -Becky
We're almost there! As long as we stay healthy and focus on our HEALTH everything will be fine.

Hey Jon (we gotta get you a nickname), you had a really stellar week and I wanted to know if maybe you wanted to spend the weekend on my boat? We were thinking of taking it over to the beta quadrant and do some fishing. Hit me up, think it would be good for your career ;). -The Burg
Greetings Jon! I'm excited to announce that you are going to be our Employee of the Week! Please submit a recent picture for our plague. Enjoy your weekend! -Becky #5456-1222 8)
Greetings Manager. Stable numbers across the board. Enjoy your weekend sir! -Planetary Supervisor Dan Garn Planet 6462 ext. 1245

Well I've got good news and bad news. The bad news is the various humanoid colonies made contact with each other, advancing and synergizing their global technologies at a rate unseen before. The good news is they've been killing each other also at an increased rate, disease, war, you name, it's not great for resources but it's keeping the lifesigns in check. Please I'm begging you though, no more Massive Structures these people can't handle that. -Supervisor Flark - Planet ZZ9-42 ext. 52752

So I know things haven't been too terrible, especially after those couple days you had. But even if things don't get worse and you keep those apes synergized I'm going to need you to come in over the weekend. Thanks. -Jay "The burg" Byrzburg x.3456
Yeah, give me a call when you get the chance, I can't help if you won't let me. -M
